DOC.brief_summary: Study of time usage of anesthesia team inside the main operating room compares between 2 groups of - Performing regional anesthesia inside the operating room - Performing regional anesthesia in the block room Study purpose: How much will the investigators save time in the main operating room if we perform the regional anesthesia in the block room?
DOC.brief_title: Can the Usage of Regional Block Room Save the Time of Anesthesia Team
DOC.detailed_description: Anesthesia-controlled time means anesthesia pre-procedure time plus anesthesia post-procedure time. We also compares the anesthesia-controlled time in 3 groups of - general anesthesia - regional anesthesia - general anesthesia combined with regional anesthesia
DOC.criteria: elective orthopedic surgical patients that require for anesthesia ( start 9AM4PM) surgery under local infiltration
